title: I forgot my PBE username
body: Recently I made a PBE account and downloaded the Client. Now i cant remember the accountname of the PBE account. When I open the PBE client and log in with the main account (which should be connected with the PBE account) Im on the normal Server (I dont know if this is normal). I never managed to log in to the PBE because i choose a dumb username i cant remember. Can I find my PBE log-in datas? Because until now i was only abel to find my normal datas.

replies.body:
Das ist ein Fall f√ºr den Support:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/de
